prompt.system:

prompt.user:
You are a risk assessment expert. Analyze the following risk factors to determine if they indicate high risk.
You must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}

Risk Factors to analyze:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 285 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.
